title: Bishop T.D. Jakes on Understanding Covid-19 Vaccines
itunes:title: Bishop T.D. Jakes on Understanding Covid-19 Vaccines
description:
Bloomberg News Technology Reporter Matt Day discusses Amazon’s incoming CEO and his influence on the technology industry. Bishop T.D. Jakes, Chairman of the T.D. Jakes Foundation, shares thoughts on “Conversations with America: Understanding the COVID-19 Vaccine.” Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Health Care Reporter Robert Langreth talk about the story “The Five Things to Get Right Before the Next Pandemic.” Bloomberg News Senior Executive Editor of Global Tech Brad Stone discusses his piece “Jeff Bezos Walks Through the One-Way Door.” And we Drive to the Close with Alan Zafran, Co-CEO at IEQ Capital.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
